title: Onboard New Developer with Proper Access
description: Create developer account, configure groups, setup sudo, set password policy

steps.instruction: Create new user account for developer 'jsmith' with bash shell
steps.expected_outcome: User jsmith created with UID 1005, home directory /home/jsmith, member of developers and docker groups

steps.instruction: Set password aging policy: 90 day max, 7 day min, 14 day warning
steps.expected_outcome: Password must be changed every 90 days

steps.instruction: Configure minimum 7 days between password changes
steps.expected_outcome: User cannot change password more than once per week

steps.instruction: Grant sudo access for systemctl and docker commands only
steps.expected_outcome: Sudo rule created: jsmith can run systemctl and docker without password

steps.instruction: Force password change on first login
steps.expected_outcome: Password expired, user must set new password on first login
jsmith: UID 1005, groups: jsmith, developers, docker, correct sudo privileges

success_criteria: Developer account created with proper groups, password policy, sudo access configured
cleanup: Send welcome email with credentials to jsmith@company.com
